com.ericbarnhill.jmra

Class MRA<N,B,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ericbarnhill.jmra.MRA<N,B,V>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MRA1D, MRA2D, MRA3D

    public abstract class MRA<N,B,V>
extends Object
    MRA is an abstract base class for multi-resolution analysis. JMRA uses a Template design pattern, with concrete classes for number of dimensions and type of transform (decimated or undecimated, etc.) Operations such as thresholding and serializing are performed with Visitor patterns.
